text: Yoritsune Matsudaira (born 23 December 1940) is a Japanese equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Japan Category:Equestrians at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Yoritsune Matsudaira (equestrian)
